arStrings.szText: Increases your Maximum Spirit by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} and Spirit Generation by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active.
Increases Maximum Spirit by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} and Spirit Generation by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is up.
